column1: What's the most embarrassing thing you've ever said or done on a date?
If you could only eat one food for the rest of your life, what would it be and why?
What's the silliest reason you've ever gotten into a fight with someone?
If you were a superhero, what would your superpower be and why?
What's the weirdest dream you've ever had? Describe it in detail.
Which celebrity do you have a secret crush on?
Have you ever sent a text message to the wrong person? What did it say?
What's the most childish thing you still enjoy doing?
If you were an animal, which one would you be and why?
What's the worst gift you've ever received and why was it so bad?
If you were a secret agent, what would be your code name, and what kind of mission do you think you'd be best suited forâ€”saving the world from evil villains or rescuing lost socks from the laundry?
What's the weirdest item in your refrigerator right now, and can you come up with an elaborate and totally fictional backstory for how it got there?
If your life had a theme song that played every time you entered a room, what would it be, and how dramatically would you strut to it?
If you had a talking parrot that could repeat only one sentence you've ever said, what would you hope it would be, and who would you let it squawk it to first?
What's the most bizarre talent you possess that you've never had a chance to showcase at parties?
If your computer could talk and share one embarrassing file from your desktop, what would it spill, and how would you explain it away?
If aliens visited Earth and you were the first human they encountered, what one thing would you want to show them to convince them we're an interesting species?
If your life were a sitcom, what type of quirky neighbor do you think you'd be to the main character, and what catchphrase would you constantly repeat?
If you could have a dinner party with any three historical figures, who would they be, and what would be the most awkward topic of conversation?
If you could switch lives with any cartoon character for a day, who would it be, and how would you navigate their animated world without causing chaos?
